attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sir ,
        I had a large part of my heart removed,in London whilst in the hospital,my ribs were damaged,later IN had to have two ribs removed because of the suicide pain,left with two more ribs of terrible pain,for 14 years I have been going to Birmingham for pain relief treatment,AS the years have gone by my life is getting worse can go out of my house.I applied for a grant to get a Laser as the major pain relief,the cost to Birmingham over the years £17.000 plus the cost of the laser £3.600 to save me the travelling 
for three min's treatment.The Swansea NHS said I was not ill enough and refused me.I feel that no one has the inteligence to help me.Only the support of my Heart Doctors.Do hope you can help.

rejection.details: Dear Sir, we are sorry to hear of your poor health. This is not an appropriate subject for a petition but perhaps you would like to write a letter to Tony Blair at 10 Downing Street, London, SW1A 2AA detailing the problems you have had. Best wishes.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
